Spring Social VKontakte 1.0.0 Milestone 4 (June 7, 2011)
=======================================================
 - Extracted Spring Social VKontakte module from core Spring Social project.
 - Renamed VKontakteApi to VKontakte.
 - Consume VKontakte resources as JSON instead of XML.

 Refer to Spring Social's changelog for a history of the VKontakte module
 prior to it being extracted into its own project.
